mkv69:2: katame daśānuśaṁsā bhojanapradānasya. ucyate. balavān bhavati. varṇavān bhavati. sukhito bhavati. pratibhānavān bhavati. dīrghāyur bhavati. mahājanābhigamyo bhavati. priyadarśano bhavati. mahābhogaś ca bhavati. svargeṣūpapadyate. kṣipraṁ ca parinirvāti.
mkv69:3: a) yathoktaṁ bhagavatā vaiśālyāṁ siṁhasya rājaputrasya. dadan siṁha priyo bhavati. santo janā bhajanti. kalyāṇaśabdo bhavati. viśāradaḥ parṣadam avagāhati. kālagato deveṣūpapadyate.
mkv69:5: te tatra nandanti ramanti ca modayanti
mkv69:10: svargeṣūpapadyate kṣipraṁ ca parinirvāti. āha ca.
mkv69:15: āyuś ca varṇaṁ ca yaśo balaṁ ca
